Contact

TIM VUCINA

Programmer, Graphic Designer, Music Producer

Read More

BIO

I am a 20 year old student at Faculty of Computer and Information Science at University of Ljubljana, Slovenia. Besides problem solving and programming I have a passion for graphic design and music production.

CODE DEVELOPMENT

Web, Java, C

I have some experience with web development with stacks such as MEAN and LAMP, leaning more comfortably towards the front-end while still understanding the underlying back-end structures and methods. Besides that I am also familiar with Java, C and Python.

GRAPHIC DESIGN

Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects

I am passionate about graphic design and its harmony of shapes, words and subliminal meaning. My design workflow includes mostly Adobe photoshop with occasional use of Illustrator for vector images, such as logos and Adobe After effects for video and animation.

MUSIC PRODUCTION

Ableton, Logic Pro, +Plugins

Music production is one of my favourite ways of expression. I have been producing music of different genres for about 5 years. My DAW of choice is Ableton but I started in Logic. I am familiar with music theory and concepts of sound engeneering and mastering.
